snippet: Officials blamed faulty construction for the collapse of a five-story building in Accra, Ghana’s capital, that killed at least nine people and trapped dozens of others.
lead_paragraph: Officials blamed faulty construction for the collapse of a five-story building in Accra, Ghana’s capital, that killed at least nine people and trapped dozens of others.

headline.main: Ghana: Faulty Construction Blamed for a Collapse
headline.print_headline: Ghana: Faulty Construction Blamed for a Collapse
